venue.address_1: where Rte 140, North St., South St. and Millbury St. meet
venue.name: Grafton Commons

item.description:
Grafton Common is having a free 4th of July concert and fireworks on Sunday,  July 3rd.

This is last minute, but if you don't have plans yet, come join us! The U.S. Airforce Band of Liberty, a full orchestra, is playing (what can be better than listening to patriotic songs on July 4th!), followed by a display of fireworks at 9pm.

I'm attaching a link to a map of Grafton Commons. http://www.grafton-ma.gov/Public_Documents/GraftonMA_Committees/Historic%20District%20Commission/mapandlist_rev%2005-20-11.pdf

I thought we could meet at the Unitarian Church on North St. at top of Commons at 6:30pm, so we can find a place to sit. The Grafton Common is supposed to be one of the most picturesque and quintessential settings in New England, so it should be an unforgettable evening!

 

If you need to reach me, my cell is 508-574-1115
item.name: MUSIC AND FIREWORKS AT GRAFTON COMMONS
